channel.title: How to join the Registered Validators group
channel.description:
Node runners who are running registered validator nodes (even if they are not in the Top 100) can request to join the **Registered Validator** group here: https://radixtalk.com/g/registered_validator
Benefits of joining the **Registered Validator** group:
* Create a post in the **Validator Introductions** category to introduce and promote your node to delegators * Create additional posts to announce promotions, news, updates, etc. for your Validator * Access to the private **Validator Chat** category * A title of **Registered Validator** added to your profile * Registered Validator flair added to your avatar * The ability to promote your Validator Node for free with a small banner ad on RadixTalk.com (see: https://radixtalk.com/t/promote-your-validator-node-for-free-on-radix-talk/69?u=stuart)
You will need to provide the Radix Validator Address (rv1...) of any nodes you run and may have to wait a short time while your membership request is reviewed.
